title: pAhi mInalOcani
sahitya:
pAHi mInalOcani gaurI parama krpAkari


anupallavi

  dEhi mudam kAmAdyari SaDvarga pIThitam agatim dInadayApari


caraNam    sakala jagan mAtA prAlEyAcala vara tuhita
suka sanakAdinutE susmitE karuNA rasa bharitE
sundarEshapriyE maNi valayE shubhakara madurA puravara nilayE
saundarya vijitha nava kuvayayE samrakSita caturdasha kuvalayE
